item.description: Fridge does not keep cool at 40+ for 3 days. A/C strugles over 35. Barely keeps up.

item.title: Homelab
item.author: gtissington@gmail.com (max-thrust)
item.description: Network Dell 2816 Netgear R7000P Laptops Yoga 720. WINdows 10 Desktop Dell Mini PC VR i7 PF Sense i7 ProxMox i7
item.dc:creator: max-thrust

item.author: gtissington@gmail.com (max-thrust)
item.description: https://www.dell.com/support/kbdoc/en-us/000121955/installing-active-directory-domain-services-and-promoting-the-server-to-a-domain-controller New-NetIPAddress -IPAddress 10.0.0.201 -DefaultGateway 10.0.0.1 -PrefixLength 24 -InterfaceIndex (Get-NetAdapter).InterfaceIndex # connect to the remote machine $c = Get-Credential $s = New-PSSession -ComputerName 10.0.0.201 -Credential $c Enter-Psssession $s # Make the machine a domain controller Add-WindowsFeature AD-Domain-Services Install-ADDSForest -DomainName xisle.net -InstallDNS # join the domain To join the domain point to the dns server qm create 110 –name dc-01 –cores 2 –ide0 local-lvm:32 –ide2 local:iso/Server2019.iso,media=cdrom –machine pc-i440fx-6.1 –memory 4096 –meta creation-qemu=6.
item.dc:creator: max-thrust

item.author: gtissington@gmail.com (max-thrust)
item.description: Enable Ping Set-NetFirewallRule -DisplayName “File and Printer Sharing (Echo Request - ICMPv4-In)” -enabled True
item.dc:creator: max-thrust

item.title: default install
item.author: gtissington@gmail.com (max-thrust)
item.description: proxmox-create vm Start Machne run mx installer boot options->choose systemd reboot sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install openssh-server now ssh to the the new salt minion box and continue follow these instruction: https://repo.saltstack.com/#debian wget -O - https://repo.saltstack.com/py3/debian/10/amd64/latest/SALTSTACK-GPG-KEY.pub | sudo apt-key add - echo "deb http://repo.saltstack.com/py3/debian/10/amd64/latest buster main" >> /etc/apt/sources.list.d/saltstack.list sudo apt-get install salt-minion sudo systemctl restart salt-minion set the minin config to master=salt.local restart the minion
item.dc:creator: max-thrust

item.title: OpenHab
item.author: gtissington@gmail.com (max-thrust)
item.description: JSON for tasmota sensor JSON PATH $.ANALOG.A0 Connect to myopenhab # 1. install cloud connector # settings > add ons > misc # 2. configure Settigns > other services > openHabCloud myopenhab.org # 3 find the UUID # 4 find the secret # 5. Copy secret and UUID to myopenhab.org-> accounts
item.dc:creator: max-thrust

item.title: Particle
item.author: gtissington@gmail.com (max-thrust)
item.description: Flash Firware releases particle flash --serial C:\argon\argon-bootloader@1.5.0-rc.2.bin particle flash --usb C:\argon\argon-tinker@1.5.0-rc.2.bin particle flash --usb C:\argon\argon-system-part1@1.5.0-rc.2.bin
item.dc:creator: max-thrust

item.title: pc-setup
item.author: gtissington@gmail.com (max-thrust)
item.description: First we need to clone a repo to get the setup scripts Install Git. winget install git.git Close and open a new Admin terminal pick up the new path # clone the repo git clone https://github.com/keenedge/keenedge.github.io.git d:\projects\xisle\kb # run the setup script d:/projects/xisle/kb/setup.ps1 setup.ps1 New-Item -Path 'D:\MDT\MDT-BUILD' -ItemType Directory -Force New-Item -Path 'D:\MDT\MDT-BUILD-LOGS' -ItemType Directory -Force New-Item -Path 'D:\MDT\MDT-DEPLOY' -ItemType Directory -Force New-Item -Path 'D:\MDT\MDT-DEPLOY-LOGS' -ItemType Directory -Force Get-VMSwitch New-VM -Name "VM-TEST" -Path "C:\VM" -MemoryStartupBytes 4GB -NewVHDPath "C:\VM\VM-TEST\VM-TEST-C.
item.dc:creator: max-thrust

item.title: Salt Stack Commands
item.author: gtissington@gmail.com (max-thrust)
item.description: Manage Salt Keys salt-key -L salt-key -A apply salt states salt '*' state.apply
item.dc:creator: max-thrust

item.title: SSH
item.author: gtissington@gmail.com (max-thrust)
item.description: generate an ssh key file ssh-keyen change ssh key file password ssh-keyen -p copy sshkey to a server cat $env:USERPROFILE\.ssh\id_rsa.pub | ssh {IP-ADDRESS-OR-FQDN} "cat >> .ssh/authorized_keys"
item.dc:creator: max-thrust
